snippet.title: A Dance of Fire and Ice - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
A Dance of Fire and Ice is a strict one-button rhythm game. There is a demo here:
https://fizzd.itch.io/a-dance-of-fire-and-ice

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/977950/A_Dance_of_Fire_and_Ice/

You should try the demo if you are not sure this game is for you. It requires good rhythm. If you want to get better at drumming lots of different kinds of rhythms, this game will help!

FAQ:
Q: Where is Rhythm Doctor
A: We are going back to it now, this was just a little side project and we have learnt a lot from it! 

End of FAQ
